title: The Goddess Affair
description: CRUISING WITH A KILLERFellow vacationers aboard the cruise ship Dante Aligheri agree that the rich Aldrich sisters are not without their flaws. Clever Diana is not quite clever enough. Poor Juno is drab and overweight. Minerva has beauty and brains but seems terribly ill.And one of them will soon die an ugly death.Private Investigator Gwenn Ramadge is lured in to investigate the tragedy and soon finds herself caught up in a shipboard full of greed, despair and mayhem.
author: Lillian O'Donnell
